# packages/adapter-rust/vendor/codelldb/linux-x64/lldb/lib/python3.12/site-packages/pip/_vendor/rich/_export_format.py
@source-hash: 448d3ca52ae6e6d0
@generated: 2026-02-09T18:01:39Z

## Purpose
Template definitions for exporting Rich console output to HTML and SVG formats. Provides string templates with placeholder formatting for rendering styled terminal content in web-compatible formats.

## Key Components

### HTML Template (L1-18)
- **CONSOLE_HTML_FORMAT**: Complete HTML document template for console export
- Includes CSS styling with placeholder variables for `{stylesheet}`, `{foreground}`, `{background}`, and `{code}`
- Uses monospace font family (Menlo, DejaVu Sans Mono, Consolas, Courier New) for terminal-like appearance
- Structured as DOCTYPE HTML5 document with embedded styles

### SVG Template (L20-73)
- **CONSOLE_SVG_FORMAT**: Comprehensive SVG template for vector-based console rendering
- Embeds Fira Code font via CDN (CloudFlare) with regular and bold weights (L25-40)
- Defines CSS classes with unique ID system for style isolation via `{unique_id}` prefix
- Contains multiple placeholder sections:
  - Dimensional: `{width}`, `{height}`, `{char_height}`, `{line_height}`
  - Positioning: `{terminal_x}`, `{terminal_y}`, `{terminal_width}`, `{terminal_height}`
  - Content: `{styles}`, `{lines}`, `{chrome}`, `{backgrounds}`, `{matrix}`
- Includes clipping path for terminal boundaries and transform groups for content positioning

### Constants (L75-76)
- **_SVG_FONT_FAMILY**: Font family identifier "Rich Fira Code"
- **_SVG_CLASSES_PREFIX**: CSS class prefix "rich-svg" for style namespace isolation

## Architecture Notes
- Templates use Python string formatting with `{}` placeholders
- Double braces `{{}}` used for literal braces in CSS/SVG output
- SVG template supports complex styling with font loading, clipping, and coordinate transforms
- Both formats designed for standalone rendering without external dependencies (except CDN fonts for SVG)
